rare_fruit_shakes.name: Dragon Fruit Kiwi Detox Shake
rare_fruit_shakes.description: A vibrant antioxidant-rich shake combining the exotic flavors of dragon fruit and kiwi for a refreshing tropical boost.
ingredients: 1 cup red dragon fruit (pitaya), peeled and cubed
instructions: Add all ingredients into a blender.
Pour into a chilled glass and top with extra kiwi slices.
health_benefits: Rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants

rare_fruit_shakes.name: Mangosteen Lychee Energy Shake
rare_fruit_shakes.description: A creamy, tropical fusion combining mangosteen and lychee with nut milk for a naturally sweet, nutrient-packed energy shake.
ingredients: 1 cup almond milk or coconut milk
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Serve chilled, optionally garnished with crushed lychee or mint leaves.
health_benefits: Superb source of micronutrients and antioxidants
